title: Ticket #3757: improve stability of Condor during stable-series upgrades
description:
This is a general request for better testing of real-world upgrades to running pools, particularly with running DAGs.

LIGO has seen an noticeable increase in running job disruptions as a result of Condor stable-series upgrades over the past year or so, particularly where large workflows are disrupted in such a way that they cannot be restarted without much lost work.

I don't have details at hand but I know Greg T. s familiar with some of the issues. If necessary, Stuart could probably reconstruct many of the details.
